mapper.select: SELECT orderNum, r.userId, nickName, rating, content, imgFileName, r.reg_date, r.enabled, reply, reply_date, restaurantNum FROM review r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId=m.userId WHERE restaurantNum=#{restaurantNum} ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM review WHERE restaurantNum=#{restaurantNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_report(reportNum, content, reg_date, orderNum) VALUES (report_seq.NEXTVAL,#{content},SYSDATE,#{orderNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET reply=#{reply}, reply_date=#{reply_date} WHERE orderNum = #{orderNum}
UPDATE review SET reply = #{reply}, reply_date = SYSDATE WHERE orderNum = #{orderNum}
UPDATE review SET reply = null, reply_date = null WHERE orderNum = #{orderNum}
